document_name: Act on the promotion of electricity production in marine wind farms
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/POL/2020/POL-2020-01-01-Act on the promotion of electricity production in marine wind farms_d3b716ee63a543c5028d097513e57f6d.pdf
document_description: The Act of 17 December 2020 on promoting electricity generation in offshore wind farms aims to boost the production of renewable energy from wind in the Baltic sea, in accordance with EU regulations.
